scripts.build: bash sh/clear.sh && pyinstaller --clean --distpath ./exe pyinstaller.spec && bash sh/set.sh && bash sh/build.sh && cd exe/main && ./watch && cd ../..
scripts.build:linux: bash sh/clear.sh && pyinstaller --clean --distpath ./linux/exe pyinstaller.linux.spec && bash sh/set.sh && bash sh/build.sh
